forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the early morning hours transition into a soft daybreak over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere hangs just shy of enveloping. Beneath the hazy, mostly cloudy skies, the city rests at a gentle temperature, inviting yet temperate, a reminder of the coastal influence ever-present. The golden hues of a setting sun, nudged by trails of wispy clouds, play a tantalizing game with the horizon, offering glimpses of warmth while hinting at the coolness of the evening air. 

As the day unfolds, expect a transformation from the muted softness of the night to a canvas of mostly sunny skies. The anticipated high nears a comfortable 67, yet will gently yield to a relaxed drop, settling into the embrace of crisp, afternoon breezes. With a west-southwest wind whispering at 5 to 14 mph and playful gusts reaching toward 20 mph, one might find the day perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps to observe the gentle sway of boats on the bay or savoring a quiet café moment, sharing space with fellow dreamers. Dressing in layers—perhaps a light shirt paired with a cozy sweater—will serve well, allowing for comfort as the playful breeze dances about and the sun reveals its warmth. Today, with its mix of sun and cloud, invites the calm yet vibrant enjoyment of life in this storied city.
